attributes.action: Same rules for vaccinated and not vaccinated people from 16th of August
attributes.additional_details: It does look like discrimination against people who are not vaccinated. I cannot see difference between vaccinated person & non vaccinated, and why can't same rule apply to everyone. and why one should self isolate & other can take the test and be free if negative. same rules should apply to everyone. option of having PCR test instead of self isolation, should of been available from start of the Covid.
attributes.background: On 16th of August vaccinated people will not have to self isolate if the been contacted by Test & Trace, but will be asked to take PCR test. Same option should be available to anyone, even if you are not vaccinated, people cannot afford to self isolate every time they get in contact Covid positive

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592748
